name: High Protein Low Cal Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: 2 scoops vanilla protein powder (Legion or similar)
Cinnamon (as much as desired for filling)
Water (add slowly until drizzling consistency for frosting)
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and line a small sheet tray or baking dish with parchment
Pour the egg whites into the tray so they form a thin, even layer
Bake the egg white sheet for 30 minutes, or until set and flexible (not crispy)
Remove from the tray and let cool slightly
Sprinkle the egg white sheet evenly with cinnamon and brown-style monkfruit
Starting at one edge, roll the sheet tightly to form a log
Slice into rolls of desired thickness
In a small bowl, whisk the 5g protein powder, monkfruit, and just enough water to make a smooth frosting
Drizzle the frosting over the rolls and serve warm
